title: Is this email legit?
body:
https://i.imgur.com/nniERSb.png

And if so, what's it trying to tell me?

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is a legitimate email... I'm not sure how your specific email client works but there should be a way to show/allow the external images that are currently being blocked.  This should expand the background image which would then expand the content of the email itself... let me know if it doesn't work though!

> [{quoted}](name=Zephyreal,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=o5BbtUXF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-05T23:14:38.152+0000)
>
> Hey there,
> 
> This is a legitimate email... I'm not sure how your specific email client works but there should be a way to show/allow the external images that are currently being blocked.  This should expand the background image which would then expand the content of the email itself... let me know if it doesn't work though!

It's just the Windows 10 Mail client.

I was able to read it online.

As an aside although probably related - I've just received an email telling me someone's requested to reset my password - along with a temporary password. All URLs in the email seem legitimate and take me to the actual League of Legends website (including the fact I'm already logged in). Can I ignore these emails, or has my password actually been reset now?

I understood from the Merch Email that they only got my email address and contact details - but that's still enough to apparently harass my inbox. -_-

EDIT: Yes, I was forced to change my password. Well at least you don't force me to pick a new password each time.
